original: rdo rje theg pa'i bstan bsrung chen mo re ma ti'i skong bshags kyi rim pa d+aak+ki gar mkhan brtse ba'i rgyang glu zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
analyzed: rdo rje theg ba ston bsrung chen mo re ma ti skong chags kyi rim ba d+aak+ki gar mkhan brtse ba rgyang glu zhes byed ba bzhugs so

original: na mo ma h+aa gu ru rat+na ye /
analyzed: na mo ma h+aa gu ru rat+na ye

original: dur khrod brgyad sogs gnas yul zhing skyes kyi //
analyzed: dur khrod brgyad sogs gnas yul zhing skye kyi

original: tshogs kyi 'khor los bsgyur mdzad he ru ka /
analyzed: tshogs kyi khor los sgyur mdzad he ru ka

analyzed: rnga yab gling gi bdag po gang de dang dbyer med drin chen bla ma spyi bor rgyal

original: chos dbyings skye med rgyal yum gyis //
analyzed: chos dbyings skye med rgyal yum gyis

analyzed: rnam rol dza t+ai dbang phyug che

original: yang bzhengs 'dod khams dbang mo yis //
analyzed: yang bzhengs dod khams dbang mo yis

original: thugs dam bskang ba'i rim pa bri //
analyzed: thugs dam skong ba rim ba bri

original: de la 'dir rgyal ba kun gyi yum mchog ma cig rdo rje re ma ti thugs dam bskang zhing dgyes pa bskyed pa'i phyir na //
analyzed: de la dir rgyal ba kun gyi yum mchog ma cig rdo rje re ma ti thugs dam skong zhing dgyes ba skyed ba phyir na

original: thabs 'di la nan tan du bya bar rig ste /
analyzed: thabs di la nan tan du byed ba rig ste

original: de yang dur khrod la sogs pa 'jigs shing ya nga ba'i gnas su /
analyzed: de yang dur khrod la sogs ba jigs shing ya nga ba gnas su

original: rten gyi dkyil 'khor mngon par 'du bgyi par bsham pa'i mdun du 'bru tshom gyi dbus su /
analyzed: rten gyi dkyil khor mngon ba du bgyid ba bsham ba mdun du bru tshom gyi dbus su

original: ma mo'i gtor ma brjid ldan sha khrag gis brgyan pa ngar mthing gi gdug dang bcas pa bshams /
analyzed: ma mo thor ma brjid ldan sha khrag gis rgyan ba ngar mthing gi gdug dang cha ba bshams

original: mtha' bskor du chu gnyis nyer spyod lnga dang sman rak+ta sogs sbreng tshar du bshams /
analyzed: mtha skor du chu gnyis nyer spyod lnga dang sman rak+ta sogs sbreng tshar du bshams

original: gzhan yang nye mkho'i yo byad /
analyzed: gzhan yang nye mkho yo byad

original: d+aa dril / rkang gling /
analyzed: d+aa dril rkang gling

original: rnga rol / ma mo 'bad pa'i spos sogs yo byad thams cad tshogs par bya'o //
analyzed: rnga rol ma mo bad ba spros sogs yo byad thams cad tshogs ba byed

original: gnyis pa rang nyid lha yi rnal 'byor la gnas pa'i ngang nas cho ga'i las gzhung bsrangs nas bsnyen bstod yan song nas /
analyzed: gnyis ba rang nyid lha yi rnal byor la gnas ba ngang nas cho ga las gzhung bsrangs nas snyen bstod yan gro nas

original: gsum pa thugs dam bskang ba'i rim pa dngos la rnam pa bzhi las /
analyzed: gsum ba thugs dam skong ba rim ba dngos la rnam ba bzhi las

analyzed: dang po skong rdzas byin rlabs ni

original: stong pa'i ngang las sogs nas /
analyzed: stong ba ngang las sogs nas

original: ma mo chen mo rdo rje re ma ti la sogs pa bstan srung dam can rgya mtsho'i spyan la lam du 'byung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: ma mo chen mo rdo rje re ma ti la sogs ba ston srung dam can rgya mtsho spyan la lam du byung ba gyur cig

original: sarba sogs nas /
analyzed: sarba sogs nas

analyzed: kham s+w+aa h+aa

analyzed: hu b+h+yo rdo rje srin mo chen mo re ma ti

analyzed: rdo rje bka sdod pho nya bran g.yog cha

analyzed: rdo rje pad+ma thugs dam bcer dgongs la

analyzed: rdo rje tha tshig bzhin du da tshur byon

analyzed: rnam mang mchod ba bye brag sna tshogs ba

analyzed: nam mkha mdzod kyi sgo phar yang phyes nas

analyzed: sngags rgya ting dzin dag ba byin rlabs ba

analyzed: ma khyed thugs dam skong ba dpyid du spro

analyzed: gsar rnying thod rtsegs glad zhag zhal ba mdzes

analyzed: lcang lo kha bad rgyu ma dra phyed phyong

analyzed: re ti bran g.yog khor cha thugs dam skong

analyzed: bru bcud chi med bdud rtsi skyem sogs kyis

analyzed: mchod ba bye brag rnam mang rgya chen pos

analyzed: ces phrin las chol ba drag tu byed

original: de ltar rdo rje'i bstan skyong chen mo d+ae wa ti dgyes bskyed bskong bshags kyi rim pa d+aak+ki gar mkhan brtse ba'i rgyang glu zhes bya ba 'adi'ang bstan bsrung chen mo dgyes pa'i mtshan ma byung bar brten te /

original: chos rje kahthoga pa'i bran gyi tha shal gsang chen rdo rje theg pa'i bstan pa la mos pa lam byed kyi sprul ming rmongs btul ba la 'gyur med kun bzang nges don dbang po zhes pa'i kahthoga rdo rje'i gdan gyis gtsug lag khang gis mgon khang rab 'jigs

original: rtsub 'gyur tshal du rdo rje gzhon nu'i bsnyen bsgrub kyis mthun seng zhig tu 'phral byung du bris pa dge /

analyzed: mang+ga lam dge
